text_block_list.text: Rewinding to the day before——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Wait, what'd you just say…? 
——I don't have to make a choice? I can run on both?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Uhhh, just to be sure, you mean not just in the Junior class… 
But the Classic and Senior classes, too, right…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Th- Then, then, you really mean it's okay for me to run without worrying about the track? I've got the OK to run anywhere and everywhere?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ——Noooo, nonono!! I'm telling you, there's just no way!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
There's gonna be a Murder on the Digitan Express! I'll sink like 
the Titanic! If I let myself get pulled in both directions, I'll get 
torn clean in half! It'll be so over!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Why tho!?
choice_data_list: Because you've put in the effort!
Because you've put in the effort!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Put in the effort…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ——Ah.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: …You're right. I did put in the effort. Day by day, giving love to my goddesses, worshipping them, building up my virtue——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Are you perchance saying… That my efforts have borne their 
fruit?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Have my virtuous deeds truly stacked up so high…? 
You think I'm finally at the level where I can stand proud as an 
Umamusume…?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
You mean, the way I am now, I can run on any track…!? 
I'll never be able to match my faves, I know, but are you saying 
my willpower's just barely above the absolute minimum?

The way she said it was a little weird, but I'm sure we wanted 
to say the same thing. Right, we both wanted to say——
choice_data_list: You should try and be an "all-rounder"!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: AND IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Wew… But, yeah, you're right!! 
If you really think about it, I've put in tons of effort!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: And, you know, "all-rounder"…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ahhh…! I just wuv the sound of that…! You mean, I can do anything, anything I want…!?
choice_data_list: I'm just talking about racing, here!
I'm just talking about racing, here!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
But of course! Trust me, I know the rules! 
Simp with your eyes, never ever with your hands! 
Slurp…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Still… I can't believe my prayers really have been answered…! All the Garden of Eden's forbidden fruit are right before my very eyes…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ——Kuuuuuuuuuhhhhh!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Right! I've steeled my will!! I, Digitan, will become an all-rounder! For the sake of witnessing ALL my faves with my own two eyes!

And with that—— 
At long last, the Selection Race.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
…Right. I'm going to be up soon. 
Here I go! I've got will strong enough to overcome samsara on 
the Sixfold Paths!

There's a rule saying you can't enter the Selection Race twice, 
but it only applies as far as "twice on the same type of track".
There isn't any rule against running a Selection Race for turf and dirt… Well, really it's more like there just wasn't any precedent for it. But if it's her—— No, because it's her…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(…This is hallowed ground upon which many 
Umamusume-chans have run. I can't allow myself to taint it. No, 
instead——)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(——I have to keep this hallowed ground all the more hallowed! 
I'll run with everything I've got!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: All the racers are in the gates—— And the race is on!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(Umamusume-chans covered in dirt and their glistening sweat…! 
Their strength—— their strength makes them so precious, so 
beautiful!!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Here comes Agnes Digital pushing to the front! 
What remarkable running on the last leg!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
(Umamusume-chans rushing across the turf, taking deep and 
heavy breaths…! Their elegance—— Their elegance makes them 
so precious, so charming…! In other words——)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I LOVE THEM ALL, IN ALL THE WAYS THEY AAAAAARE!!!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
What's this!? Agnes Digital's showing unbelievable speed on 
turf, too!! Is such a thing even possible!?

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: What the…!? You mean… she doesn't pick her battlefield…!? She might have what it takes to be the strongest one day!!

She ran even more wonderfully than I thought she would! 
I hurried down to congratulate her on a job well done.
choice_data_list: Good work! Nice running out there!
Good work! Nice running out there!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Heheh, thank you very much…! And I'm super-duper thankful that I got to see my faves up close and personal!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I owe it all to a you-know-who trainer with a whole bunch of 
virtue——

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
You there! That was incredible. I can't believe you were so 
skilled on both turf and dirt…!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ——Hiwah!? Wh-Whaat!?

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Please, won't you work with me? We'll start by building your 
skills with Junior class dirt races, then focus on turf——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Eh, ah, sorry! But I have to say no…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I'm the type of girl who's all about diversity, you see! I can't just 
focus on one or the other, you see! I'm trying to be an 
all-rounder, you see! And——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
The thing is… This trainer here's already agreed to train with 
little old Digitan!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
L-look, just play along…! 
All these people are getting me nervous!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Phew, I'm free… All eyes were on me for a bit there. Weird… 
Sorry for getting you caught up in that.
choice_data_list: Oh, right. About what you said back there.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Oh. Eheheh… It was just the first thing that came to mind. 
Sorry.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
But, uh, I really do want to work with you. 
See, most of the time when I'm with someone else, things tend to 
get real awkward——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
You're an Umamusume-chan-fan too, so I'm really comfortable 
around you…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Plus, I don't think there's anyone else in the world who'd take 
my yapping as seriously as you. So…! Are you in?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Oh, phew…! 
Alrighty then, I'm looking forward to working with you!

Umamusume run for all sorts of reasons. They chase their 
dreams in their own amazing ways. No matter what kind of 
dream it is. So I'll do my best to support her——

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ——Oh, almost forgot. Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: What color glowstick do you want?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: The Selection Races aren't done yet! We've got to get our virtuous deeds for the day, don't we!? ——Don't we!?
